operations.summary: get shopping cart list by table list
operations.notes: get shopping cart list by table list

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The starting index of the record to be retrieved. For example, if you specify 10, this means the MongoDB will skip index numbers 0 to 9, returning only the records that start from 10th index.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum number of records that should be included in the response. If you leave this blank, the default value is 10

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: A YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss-formatted time that will determine the create time interval of the result

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: A YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss-formatted time that will determine the create time interval of the result
